description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Exciting bike races of your Avatar through mountains and forests, across lakes and tunnels, while avoiding obstacles and your opponents. Enjoy the 24 circuits and 6 game modes (Single Race, Time Attack, Racing for points and Tournaments), alone, against a friend in split screen or against the rest of the planet through Xbox Live.
